duties_responsibilities.duty: Read, analyze, and interpret sales orders, technical product requirements, technical procedures, or regulations
Prepare clear, complete and accurate working plans and detail drawings from rough or detailed documentation, sketches, notes or otherwise
Utilize knowledge of various machines, engineering practices, mathematics, building materials, and other physical sciences to complete drawings
Use computer-assisted drafting (CAD) equipment and software
Discover clients' needs, make recommendations, and sell ABM Services
